text: hi I'm David Pogue I'm traveling this
week and like an idiot I forgot to bring
my camcorder so I hope you don't mind if
this week's video is in fact just a
slideshow anyway this weekend the times
I reviewed the new blackberry curve it's
a cell phone a music player and of
course a very good email terminal I
don't know why they call it the
blackberry curve it's not much curvier
than any other blackberry it's actually
a descendant of this model the
blackberry pearl a very successful
smartphone or non corporate types which
means that is absolutely loaded it has a
speaker phone bluetooth voice dialing
and a camera with a flash in fact the
curve is better than the old pearl
because the curve has a full alphabet
keyboard rather than the 14 p 1 and the
word guessing software that the pearl
uses the curve also has a built-in
spelling checker and bluetooth stereo
for listening to music through wireless
headphones the only real downside is the
carrier the first cell carrier for the
curve is AT&T meaning that the internet
signal is really slow and of course the
coverage isn't great but otherwise this
is a terrific phone that does a lot of
things really well oh except i should
mention that the blackberry curve can't
capture video it can only take still
pictures but hey sometimes still
pictures do the job just fine
you
